document.full_text: japan's miki ando upstaged olympic champion kim yuna to strike gold at the world figure skating championships on saturday and hoped she had lifted the spirits of her devastated nation.
document.title: figure skating-japan's ando wins emotional gold
lines_and_colors: japan's miki ando upstaged olympic champion kim yuna to strike gold at the world figure skating championships on saturday and hoped she had lifted the spirits of her devastated nation.
